body_html: Hey @anikalindtner - this is because a user can be created by adding a GH handle to a team. The app tries to get the email from GH but if that fails for some reason (e.g. misspelled GH handle, no email address available, network error), the user record on the teams app will be left without an email. There is little to nothing we can do about it.

body: Hey @anikalindtner - this is because a user can be created by adding a GH handle to a team. The app tries to get the email from GH but if that fails for some reason (e.g. misspelled GH handle, no email address available, network error), the user record on the teams app will be left without an email. There is little to nothing we can do about it.
